# NSSaveOptions.yes

**Case**

Indicates a modified document should be saved on closing without asking the user.

## Declaration

```swift
case yes
```

## Constants

- **NSSaveOptions.no**: Indicates a modified document should not be saved on closing.
- **NSSaveOptions.ask**: Indicates the user should be asked before saving any modified documents on closing. When no option is specified, this is the default.
